name: places/ChIJobmy9mVZwokRX1SJSgla_zE
adrFormatAddress: 515 7th Ave, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
I purchased my mat at the end of 2019 and experienced a lot of technical difficulties with the charging port in 2020 and was sent a replacement charging cable.  By 2021 that cable was no longer working and I reached out for many months to try to receive assistance, never heard back for months on end after repeated attempts,  and eventually shared my negative opinion publicly. (Not something I do very often.)

Many months later a customer service rep reached out to me and apologized, and the company sent me a new mat.  This was clearly a wonderful resolution for me, but also indicative of the fact that they were aware that technical flaws with their products were common enough that they had to implement this type of policy.

Within two years the plastic coating around the gem pebbles was overheating, cracking and splitting open.  The result was that the entire mat is now unusable as the dozens of thousands of gems spill all over the place.  The gems run through long tunnels in the mats and aren't bound to the compartments they're in, so a small tear is a huge problem.  I used the mat per manufacturer instructions and was under the impression that the new mat would be accompanied by the new warrantee policy which was 5 years.

I reached out to HealthyLine to discuss repair options as their products are investments.  They offered no options to me but offered that I could trade my current mat in and apply half the value towards a new purchase. What masquerades as a generous buy-back is being offered to me at the end of a tenuous relationship with a company that has had hot and cold customer service and repeated technical issues in my experience, for which they don't want to take consistent responsibility.

I'm incredibly disappointed that a company which very evidently realized the need to extend their warrantee from a 1 year to a 5 year policy is so cagey about standing behind their products which present clear defects.  Wellness companies should do better.

originalText.text: This place is magnificent. The experience is truly once in a lifetime. The different light’s bed makes you feel so calm and relax . I fell asleep in less than 5 minutes and came out feeling like an entirely different person. This is not a paid review. I will make this place a must visit at least once a week.

I fell asleep in less than 5 minutes and came out feeling like an entirely different person. This is not a paid review. I will make this place a must visit at least once a week.

originalText.text: Arjay facilitated a great experience.  I had a short meditation on the Rainbow Chakra Mat for 5 minutes which at first didn't feel any different from an experience with a heated pad, however 5 minutes after I left I experienced a level of bodily relaxation and calm that carried on with me the rest of the evening.  Looking forward to my next experience with a Healthyline mat

originalText.text: I must say that I have had a wonderful experience with Scarlet the two times I have been on the store. I first purchased the Amethyst Bolster Firm Heated InfraMat Pro in January 2023, and because it was so beneficial for my lower back and neck, I decided to pull the plug this passed week, on the TAJ-Mat Full Short 6024 Firm - Photon PEMF InfraMat Pro, and a TAO Mat Small 1818 Soft InfraMat Pro, to take on my travels. I have yet to use the Small TAO Mat, but the Full Short TAJ Mat, with the Amethyst Bolster, are a great combo as small therapeutic spa. I am extremely satisfied with the products performance so far, and with Scarlet friendliness and knowledgeable feedback! Thank you very much for making a positive impact in people’s life!

originalText.text: Peter explained to me the different products of healthyline. I liked the gemstone mat that I bought it for Valentines Day! Wow extremely comfortable and heating nicely. Next time I will get the larger size.
